original_text: But stay awake at all times, praying that you may have strength to escape all these things that are going to take place, and to stand before the Son of Man.”
korean_text: 이러므로 너희는 장차 올 이 모든 일을 능히 피하고 인자 앞에 서도록 항상 기도하며 깨어 있으라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But stay awake at all times
praying that you may have strength
that are going to take place
and to stand before the Son of Man
